about_the_game:
Vampire’s Castle is a 4-player online co-op horror game that plunges you into the heart of a cursed fortress, where unimaginable treasures await—if you can survive long enough to collect them. Enter alone or team up with up to three others to explore the castle's dark corridors, avoiding the wrath of Vlad, the vampire who guards it.

The castle is alive with danger, and every step you take could be your last. Vlad stalks the halls in two terrifying forms: as a bat, he relies on his acute hearing to hunt you down. Move too loudly, and he’ll be drawn to your location. As a man, he sees everything in his path, ready to end your hunt for treasure if you’re caught. Use your surroundings carefully, as your survival depends on both silence and strategy.

To escape with your bounty, you'll need to learn how to outsmart Vlad. Some paths can be blocked by opening windows that cast light into the corridors, forcing the vampire to retreat. But be cautious—these windows are not everywhere, and the light can only protect you for so long.

The castle’s layout is as dangerous as it is vast, with some areas louder than others. Certain rooms have creaky floors or footstep-heavy corridors where the sound of your movements will echo. Be sure to check your surroundings and make sure Vlad isn’t nearby before entering these riskier zones.

Time is of the essence, and your goal is simple: collect as much treasure as you can before you find a way out. But remember—staying quiet, staying hidden, and using the environment to your advantage are the keys to survival. Will you escape with your loot, or will you become a permanent resident of the castle?

short_description: Vampire’s Castle is a 4-player online co-op horror game. Lured by the promise of treasure, you and your team must explore a cursed fortress while avoiding Vlad, the terrifying Dracula. As a bat, he hears. As a man, he sees. Move carefully, collect valuables, and survive—or face the consequences.
